c74object.name: aoo.server
c74object.description: Use this object to host an AOO server for a local network or the public internet.

ol.li: group/user management, so that peers may contact each other by group and user name instead of IP and port.
UDP hole punching to establish peer-to-peer connections over the public internet.

discussion.p: If you want to connect clients over the public internet, your server machine must be publicly accessible and the given port number must be known by all clients.
for more information about the project check the Audio over OSC Library website
